RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 63. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEEP DIAMOND TM slow start, rallied. LOOSE STORIES early foot, caught. KAS IM SLINKY chased, angled out to no avail. ROMEO SIERRA broke through gate. BOGARTS FLASH tucked, faded. PARTY MAKER three path, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Kas Im Slinky
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, angled out to no avail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 220 Y Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 6500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMA CORONA FAN proved best in duel. IGOT SUMTING SPECIAL wide, dueled, denied. TOASTIN CHAMPAGNE bid between, missed. PAINT THIS SMOKE not enough late. ALEKCA mild threat. BC MARY JEAUX JET lost path midway. TTT MID KNIGHT broke in, lost chance.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 870 Y Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 4000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATRIOT MOUNTAIN led all the way. FRISCO CANDY MAN couldnt catch leader. JESS LOUISIANA TEE second flight, no rally. ARZON widest, mild gain. TDZ TOAST TO BLUE chased, mild menace. WHAT HUH angled out, empty. TWO TIMIN TAYLOR saved ground to no avail. TC ANNAS GIRL lost ground with wide trip.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 400 Y Dirt CR: 89. Optional Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 26, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS RED HOT PATRIOT urged, propelled. RM SUPER ANGEL between, outfinished. EKG ONE SWEET WAGON hard fought loss. SIR WILLIAM TERRY in mix, denied. JRS ONE SWEET GATOR mid pack duel. FIRST GREEN DIAMOND no response. CHANGING THE GAME steadily weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Jrs One Sweet Gator
ENTRY.OWNER: Orozco Orlando and Leyva Rogelio G

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 86. Optional Claiming Purse 7700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JLA DOUBLE DOWN DASH kept to task. JESS MOLLY BROWN strong bid, missed. CORONA FOR GOLD broke out, good bid. BLACK JACK TARA in hunt throughout. IMA FANCY KEEPER floated inward midway. OVERCAST went evenly. FLORECITA SEDUCTORA bid, outkicked. FIRST LADYBUG DOC tardy break. KOOL MOVE urged, empty. TF IMA FEARLESS BLUE never fully fired.

ENTRY.NAME: Jla Double Down Dash
ENTRY.OWNER: McKinnon Archie T and Faul Annette

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IM THAT DOVE side by side, won bob. AFRICAN QUEEN fired, nosed out. LOUIE BLUES in tight, strong late kick. IGOTYOURDASHTOCASH close up, missed. JUST POLLITICAL lunged at break. PULLTHETRIGGERTIGER no troubles. MARVELOUS ONE danced in gate. TCB AMERICAN PILOTO raced head high. JRS HEZA MAJESTIC broke through gate. BT TRES LUNAS stumbled start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 300 Y Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TF JESS DASHIN broke out, sped off. JP LA VENADITA drifted in early. BT DATES PATRIOT gaining at finish. STAND UP PERRY bobbled break. THROW THE HEAT bid, outlasted. BAR FIGHT BLUES squeezed at start. RIO ROJO NEGRAS forced out at break. CORONA ESPECIALL lost path early. SHOOTNTHEMOON steadily faded. JANICES PROSPECT tardy break.

ENTRY.NAME: Corona Especiall
ENTRY.OWNER: Moreno Oscar Edel and Galicia Juan
